Content: I wasn't careful enough and broke the aerial on my 1996 Goldwing. I've looked up replacements online but they don't seem to be clear enough to me as to what they are and if I need just the top piece or the whole thing. Can any of you help me with this, please? Here are pics that I hope will help.
